skill.description: Generates creative domain name ideas for your project and checks availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, etc.). Saves hours of brainstorming and manual checking.

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or environment variable reading. The skill provides domain name brainstorming prompts that guide AI behavior.

content.value_statement: Finding the perfect domain name takes hours of brainstorming and manual checking. This skill generates creative, brandable domain suggestions and checks availability across multiple TLDs like .com, .io, .dev, and .ai.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes your project description to understand your needs and target audience
Generates creative, brandable domain name suggestions across multiple categories
Checks domain availability across popular TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, .app)
Provides branding insights explaining why certain names work well
Suggests alternative variations when top choices are taken
Offers guidance on domain naming best practices and pricing context
limitations: Cannot actually register domains or perform real-time availability checks
Does not verify trademark conflicts or legal availability
Cannot check social media handle availability
Does not connect to domain registrars or provide purchase links

use_cases.title: Startup Naming
use_cases.description: Generate brandable domain names for new ventures and check availability across tech-focused TLDs

use_cases.title: Personal Branding
use_cases.description: Find memorable domains for personal portfolios, creative agencies, or freelance businesses

use_cases.title: Product Naming
use_cases.description: Brainstorm creative names for new products and explore variations that resonate with target audiences

prompt_templates.title: Basic Brainstorming
prompt_templates.prompt: I'm building a [project description]. Suggest creative domain names.

prompt_templates.title: Specific TLD Preference
prompt_templates.prompt: I need a domain name for my [product type]. Prefer short names with .ai or .io extension.

prompt_templates.title: Keyword-Based Search
prompt_templates.prompt: Suggest domain names using the words 'keyword1' or 'keyword2' for my [business type].

prompt_templates.title: Competitor Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me domain patterns used by successful [industry] companies, then suggest similar available ones.

output_examples.input: I'm building a tool for developers to share code snippets. Suggest creative domain names.
output: Top Pick: snippet.dev - perfect for developer audience, short and memorable

best_practices: Act fast - good domains get taken quickly by others
Register multiple TLD variations to protect your brand
Test domain names out loud to ensure they are easy to pronounce and spell
Check that your chosen name does not conflict with existing trademarks
anti_patterns: Using numbers or hyphens that confuse verbal communication
Choosing overly long or hard-to-spell names
Picking names that limit your future expansion to new markets

faq.question: Does this skill actually check real-time domain availability?
faq.answer: No. This skill generates suggestions and provides guidance on availability. You must use a domain registrar to verify real-time status.

faq.question: What TLDs does the skill support?
faq.answer: The skill covers .com, .io, .dev, .ai, .app, .co, .xyz, .design, .eco, .fashion, and other common TLDs.

faq.question: Can I use this skill for non-English domain names?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill can brainstorm names in multiple languages and suggest international TLDs for global audiences.

faq.question: Is my project information stored or shared?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill. Your project descriptions remain private within your AI conversation.

faq.question: Why are some suggested domains marked as premium?
faq.answer: Premium domains are already registered and listed for sale at higher prices. The skill notes these to help you evaluate alternatives.

faq.question: How is this different from other domain name generators?
faq.answer: This skill combines creative brainstorming with branding insights, TLD guidance, and contextual suggestions based on your specific use case.
